## A Bit About Me

-   **Location:** Russia, Moscow 🗺️

-   **Growth:** Always striving to learn new things and constantly improve myself 📚

-   **Hobbies:** Drawing ✒️ / Dancing 💃 / Guitar 🎸 / Sport 🏀 / Games 🎮 / Design ➰
